item.title: 埃隆-马斯克表示完全支持 "强硬 "的特朗普，并发布照片
item.description: 特斯拉公司首席执行官、亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克说，他 "完全支持 "唐纳德-特朗普，称这位共和党总统候选人 "强硬"。【原文：Elon Musk, the billionaire CEO of Tesla, said he "fully endorsed" Donald Trump, calling the Republican presidential candidate "tough."】

item.title: 华盛顿邮报》报道：OpenAI 举报人要求美国证券交易委员会调查限制性保密协议
item.description: 据《华盛顿邮报》周六报道，OpenAI 的举报人已向美国证券交易委员会提出申诉，要求对这家人工智能公司涉嫌限制性的保密协议进行调查。【原文：OpenAI whistleblowers have filed a complaint with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, calling for an investigation over the artificial intelligence company's allegedly restrictive non-disclosure agreements, the Washington Post reported on Saturday, citing a copy of the letter sent to the SEC.】

item.title: 阿根廷部长表示停止扩大货币基础以降低通胀率
item.description: 阿根廷经济部长路易斯-卡普托（Luis Caputo）周六在信息平台 X 上表示，阿根廷将停止扩大货币基础，作为政府抗击通货膨胀行动的一部分。【原文：Argentina will cease expanding its monetary base as part of the government's campaign to combat inflation, Economy Minister Luis Caputo said on messaging platform X on Saturday.】

item.title: 波音开始与美国联邦航空局（FAA）进行 777X 认证试飞，Air Current 表示
item.description: 据《时事航空》（The Air Current）周五晚些时候报道，波音公司在美国航空监管机构的陪同下正式开始对777-9进行飞行测试，标志着认证程序向前迈进了一步。【原文：Boeing formally began flight testing of the 777-9 with U.S. aviation regulators onboard, The Air Current reported late on Friday, marking a step forward in the certification process.】

item.title: 国营媒体称，抢购中国国债的机构是在做空经济
item.description: 中国央行支持的《金融时报》周六援引业内人士和专家的观点报道称，抢购中国国债的金融机构基本上是在做空中国经济。【原文：Financial institutions snapping up Chinese government bonds are basically shorting the Chinese economy, China's central bank-backed Financial News reported on Saturday, citing what it said were the views of industry sources and experts.】

item.title: 中国商务部副部长会见沃尔玛首席执行官麦克雷
item.description: 中国商务部在一份声明中说，中国商务部副部长王受文周五会见了沃尔玛公司首席执行官凯瑟琳-麦克莱（Kathryn McLay）。【原文：China's Vice Minister of Commerce Wang Shouwen met the chief executive officer of Walmart Inc , Kathryn McLay, on Friday, the commerce ministry said in a statement.】

item.title: 越南 VinFast 因市场放缓推迟在美国建电动汽车工厂
item.description: 由于全球电动汽车市场的不确定性，越南电动汽车（EV）制造商 VinFast 计划将其价值 40 亿美元的北卡罗莱纳州工厂的投产时间推迟到 2028 年，并将今年的交付量预期下调 20,000 辆。【原文：Vietnamese electric vehicle (EV) maker VinFast is delaying the launch of its planned $4 billion factory in North Carolina to 2028 and cutting its delivery forecast for this year by 20,000 units amid uncertainties in the global EV market.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 美国降息预期令投资者将目光投向大型科技公司之外
item.description: 迫在眉睫的美国降息给投资者带来了一个艰难的选择：是坚持持有一年多来推动回报的大型科技股，还是转向市场中不太受青睐的、可能从宽松货币政策中受益的领域。【原文：Looming U.S. interest rate cuts are presenting investors with a tough choice: stick with the Big Tech stocks that have driven returns for more than a year or turn to less-loved areas of the market that could benefit from easing monetary policy.】

item.title: 韩国 SK On 正在洽谈供应棱柱形电动汽车电池，寻求扭亏为盈
item.description: 韩国电动汽车（EV）电池制造商 SK On 的一位高管表示，该公司正在与汽车制造商洽谈供应棱柱电池事宜，以扩大现有袋装电池的供应范围，在全球电动汽车（EV）需求放缓的情况下努力扭亏为盈。【原文：South Korean EV battery maker SK On is in talks with automakers to supply prismatic batteries, expanding from its existing pouch-type batteries, a senior executive said, as it scrambles to turn around amid slowing global electric vehicle (EV) demand.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，马斯克向为选举特朗普而努力的超级基金捐款
item.description: 据彭博社周五援引消息人士的话报道，亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）已向一个致力于选举美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的超级慈善组织捐款。【原文：Billionaire Elon Musk has donated to a super pac working to elect former U.S. President Donald Trump, Bloomberg reported on Friday, citing sources.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会就不公平商业行为向特许经营商发出警告
item.description: 美国贸易监管机构周五宣布了一系列行动，旨在打击品牌所有者非法强加给美国特许经营商的 "不公平和欺骗性做法"，如要求支付特许经营合同中未列出的新费用，或利用合同条款阻止特许经营商与监管机构对话。【原文：A U.S. trade regulator on Friday announced a suite of actions taking aim at "unfair and deceptive practices" it said are illegally imposed on U.S. franchisees by their brand owners, such as requiring new fees not outlined in franchise contracts, or using contract provisions to discourage franchisees from speaking with regulators.】

item.title: 汽车工人工会主席抨击特朗普，称赞拜登但未使用其姓名
item.description: 美国汽车工人联合会（United Auto Workers）主席肖恩-费恩（Shawn Fain）周五批评了唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的美国总统候选人资格，并赞扬了乔-拜登（Joe Biden）总统，但没有使用他的名字，也没有重复工会一月份对他今年秋季连任的支持。【原文：United Auto Workers President Shawn Fain on Friday criticized Donald Trump's U.S. presidential candidacy and praised President Joe Biden without ever using his name or repeating the union's January endorsement for his re-election this fall.】

item.title: 加贝利要求派拉蒙提供有关国家娱乐公司估值的详细信息
item.description: 亿万富翁投资人马里奥-加贝里（Mario Gabelli）的投资公司周五告诉路透社，该公司正在寻求有关 National Amusements 资产估值的更多细节，这表明该公司可能会对本周签署的一项具有里程碑意义的娱乐业交易提出质疑。【原文：Billionaire investor Mario Gabelli's investment firm is seeking more details about the valuation of National Amusements assets, the investor told Reuters on Friday, signaling the firm may challenge a landmark entertainment industry deal inked this week.】

item.title: 现代汽车韩国工会批准工资协议，工会称
item.description: 现代汽车公司和代表其韩国员工的工会周六达成了一项工资协议，工会表示，该协议将把年薪提高约 4.65%，从而避免了该汽车公司最大生产基地的罢工。【原文：Hyundai Motor and a union representing its South Korean workforce on Saturday sealed a wage deal that will boost annual pay by about 4.65%, the union said, avoiding a strike in the carmaker's biggest manufacturing base.】

item.title: 独家报道OpenAI正在开发代号为 "草莓 "的新推理技术
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士和路透社查阅的内部文件显示，聊天软件制造商 OpenAI 正在一个代号为 "草莓 "的项目中开发一种新的人工智能模型。【原文：ChatGPT maker OpenAI is working on a novel approach to its artificial intelligence models in a project code-named “Strawberry,” according to a person familiar with the matter and internal documentation reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 第一共和前雇员对美国联邦存款保险公司的诉讼被驳回
item.description: 加利福尼亚州一名联邦法官驳回了一起指控联邦存款保险公司（FDIC）不当阻止破产的第一共和银行（First Republic Bank）近 170 名前雇员动用至少 1.5 亿美元退休基金的诉讼。【原文：A federal judge in California dismissed a lawsuit accusing the Federal Deposit Insurance Corp (FDIC) of improperly blocking nearly 170 former employees of the failed First Republic Bank from accessing at least $150 million of retirement funds.】

item.title: 消息人士称必和必拓和隆丁将联合竞购 Filo 公司
item.description: 两位消息人士周五告诉路透社，矿业巨头必和必拓（BHP）和加拿大隆丁矿业公司（Lundin Mining Corp）将联合竞购菲洛公司（Filo Corp）。【原文：Mining giant BHP and Canada's Lundin Mining Corp are set to make a joint bid for Filo Corp , two sources told Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: 美国邮票价格周日将升至 73 美分
item.description: 美国一等邮票的价格将于周日从 68 美分上涨至 73 美分，这是一系列涨价中的最新一次。【原文：The price of first-class U.S. mail stamps will rise on Sunday to 73 cents from 68 cents, the latest in a series of price hikes.】

item.title: 银行高管对美国总统大选的看法
item.description: 银行业高管周五表示，美国大选和地缘政治的不确定性是客户在权衡未来几个季度的业务决策时重点考虑的因素。【原文：The U.S. election and geopolitical uncertainty are among the factors clients are focused on as they weigh their business decisions for the next few quarters, banking executives said on Friday.】

item.title: 美国法院驳回对 FCC 批准 SpaceX 卫星的质疑
item.description: 美国一家上诉法院周五维持了联邦通信委员会的决定，批准 SpaceX 部署数千颗 Starlink 卫星以提供天基宽带互联网服务的计划。【原文：A U.S. appeals court on Friday upheld the decision of the Federal Communications Commission to approve a SpaceX plan to deploy thousands of Starlink satellites to provide space-based broadband internet service.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，Arbor Realty 因贷款行为受到美国司法部调查
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五报道，Arbor Realty Trust 正在接受纽约联邦检察官和联邦调查局的调查，几个月前做空者曾对该贷款公司的做法和信息披露进行过攻击。【原文：Arbor Realty Trust is being probed by Federal prosecutors and the Federal Bureau of Investigation in New York months after short sellers attacked the lender's practices and disclosures, Bloomberg News reported on Friday.】

item.title: 评级机构称，6 月份美国写字楼拖欠贷款率上升
item.description: 根据评级机构的最新报告，6 月份美国写字楼贷款的拖欠率有所上升，部分原因是空置率增加和利率上升。【原文：The delinquency rate among U.S. office loans rose in June, driven in part by increasing vacancies and elevated interest rates, according to recent reports from ratings agencies.】

item.title: 美国银行业高管权衡宏观经济风险和美联储加息路径
item.description: 美国顶级银行的高管们在报告喜忧参半的第二季度业绩时，对美国联邦储备委员会（U.S. Federal Reserve）未来的降息路径仍存在分歧，并指出消费者健康状况恶化。【原文：Executives from top U.S. banks remained divided over the U.S. Federal Reserve's future path on interest rate cuts and flagged deterioration in consumer health when they reported mixed second-quarter results.】

item.title: 意大利部长称欧洲央行逼迫裕信银行退出俄罗斯太过分了
item.description: 意大利外交部长安东尼奥-塔亚尼（Antonio Tajani）周五表示，欧洲中央银行在推动意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）退出俄罗斯市场方面做得太过分了。【原文：The European Central Bank has overreached in pushing Italian bank UniCredit to get out of Russia, Italy's Foreign Minister Antonio Tajani said on Friday.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称新兴市场资本流入量恢复至 2018 年水平
item.description: 国际货币基金组织周五表示，去年流入除中国以外的新兴市场的资本总额增至1100亿美元，占其经济产出的0.6%，为2018年以来的最高水平。【原文：The International Monetary Fund on Friday said gross capital inflows into emerging markets excluding China last year rose to $110 billion or 0.6% of their economic output, the highest level since 2018.】

item.title: 华尔街银行投资银行业务有所改善，但仍需谨慎
item.description: 华尔街银行周五公布的季度财报显示，交易渠道更加畅通，投资银行业务活动跃升，但同时也提到了一些不利因素和谨慎行事的理由。【原文：Wall Street banks reported a healthier pipeline for deals and a jump in investment banking activity in quarterly earnings on Friday, but also cited some headwinds and reasons for caution.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，Bunge和Viterra提出出售在两个欧盟国家的资产
item.description: 据直接知情人士周五透露，美国谷物商邦吉（Bunge）和嘉能可（Glencore）支持的维特拉公司（Viterra）已提出出售在两个欧盟国家的资产，以争取获得欧盟反垄断机构对其340亿美元合并案的批准。【原文：U.S. grains merchant Bunge and Glencore-backed Viterra have offered to sell assets in two European Union countries in a bid to secure EU antitrust clearance for their $34 billion merger, people with direct knowledge of the matter said on Friday.】

item.title: 花旗集团寻求结束因 ATM 收费引发的种族偏见诉讼
item.description: 花旗集团要求美国法官驳回一项种族歧视诉讼，该诉讼称花旗银行免除少数族裔银行客户的 ATM 费用违反了联邦民权法。【原文：Citigroup asked a U.S. judge to dismiss a racial-discrimination lawsuit that claims the bank violated federal civil rights law by waiving ATM fees for customers of minority-owned banks.】

item.title: 道指在大盘反弹中创下历史新高
item.description: 道琼斯工业平均指数（Dow Jones Industrial Average）周五盘中创下历史新高，在近期广泛的市场涨势中追赶其他两个美国主要指数。【原文：The Dow Jones Industrial Average scaled an intraday record high on Friday, playing catch-up with two other main U.S. indexes in recent broad-based market gains.】

item.title: 消息人士称，德国将在欧盟对中国电动汽车征收关税的投票中投弃权票
item.description: 消息人士周五告诉路透社，德国将在周一欧盟成员国对中国电动汽车征收临时关税的投票中投弃权票。【原文：Germany is set to abstain in Monday's vote by European Union member states on imposing provisional tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles, sources told Reuters on Friday.】
